thread.title: Joey Kirby
thread.title_full: Cottman of Winston-Salem reviewed by Joey Kirby

author: Joey Kirby
title: Joey Kirby
text: I live in Virginia. Everyone in my area seemed afraid to tackle a transmission swap for my 2014 Mitsubishi outlander sport CVT transmission. Sue found a replacement for me and sounded confident in the work she and her staff can provide. I traveled to WINSTON SALEM from WYTHEVILLE Va. Everything was great from start to finish. Now after 1000 miles, the transmission works like a charm still. Thanks Sue and Cottman Transmission.
